title: Inheritance field names cut off - Nightly 1.77.2
author: pauldurham
body_snippet:
In the Inheritance window, the field names are often cut off due to length.  There is no means to expand the space allocated to the field names.
Example:  "Server Authentication" is cut off at "Server Authentica".

## Expected Behavior
Field names should be fully visible.

## Current Behavior
Field names are sometimes cut off.

## Possible Solution
Expand field column width with text length.

## Your Environment
Windows 10 Enterprise 64-bit 20H2.

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: This is resolvable by enlarging the configuration settings panel, I don't know if it's really necessary to change the default view and enable scrolling in such a case. The field name is displayed at the bottom and when hovering with the mouse.

comments.author: pauldurham
comments.snippet: I see that there is an invisible bar between field name & field value that can be "grabbed" with the pointer and expanded or contracted.  Perhaps make this bar visible?
